page.title: 02EDUCATION IN CHALFORD
page.content: There are four primary schools in our area.The primary age range is from four to eleven years,after that you go to a secondary school until you are sixteen or you can stay on till eighteen.Bussage School is the newest school in our area,it was only built a few years ago,it has around a hundred pupils.Chalford Hill School is over a hundred years old and has a hundred and forty pupils.Christ Church School has thirty six pupils.Oakridge School is the smallest school in our area with twenty-one pupils.The nearest secondary school is Manor School,with seven hundred pupils.All the schools have good facilities.As there are four primary schools they are all within easy walking distance of our homes.
